name: upload-to-mapbox
description: A GBDX task that uploads raster or vector files to Mapbox Studio.

inputPortDescriptors.name: input
inputPortDescriptors.description: Contains input file. Acceptable file formats are tif and geojson. Size limits can be found at https://www.mapbox.com/api-documentation/#uploads.

inputPortDescriptors.name: timeout
inputPortDescriptors.description: Upload timeout in seconds. Default is 600.

inputPortDescriptors.name: min_zoom
inputPortDescriptors.description: Minimum zoom level for vector tiles. Default is 0.

inputPortDescriptors.name: max_zoom
inputPortDescriptors.description: Maximum zoom level for vector tiles. Default is 14.

inputPortDescriptors.name: filtered_properties
inputPortDescriptors.description: Exclude named properties from all features in input geojson. Property names should be given in string separated by commas. Default is none.

inputPortDescriptors.name: full_detail
inputPortDescriptors.description: Detail in bits at max zoom level. Default is 12.

inputPortDescriptors.name: low_detail
inputPortDescriptors.description: Detail in bits at lower zoom levels. Default is 12.
